report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1729 Linux Kernel Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1729 Linux Kernel Vulnerability
text: Linux Kernel could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a race condition in the perf subsystem. By sending specially-crafted syscalls, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges to root.
